headline.main: Jurors Unmoved by Former Va. Governor's Appeal Arguments
headline.print_headline: Jurors Unmoved by Former Va. Governor's Appeal Arguments

docs.snippet: As former Virginia Gov. Bob McDonnell's public corruption case goes before the U.S. Supreme Court, three of the jurors who convicted him say they remain certain they did the right thing....
docs.lead_paragraph: As former Virginia Gov. Bob McDonnell's public corruption case goes before the U.S. Supreme Court, three of the jurors who convicted him say they remain certain they did the right thing.

headline.main: North Carolina GOP's Careful Plan Could Be in Jeopardy
headline.print_headline: North Carolina GOP's Careful Plan Could Be in Jeopardy

docs.snippet: A decade ago, GOP leaders developed a strategy to take over North Carolina's state government for the first time since 1870: Aggressively pursue the seats of vulnerable Democratic lawmakers and win House and Senate majorities by 2010; use those ma...
docs.lead_paragraph: A decade ago, GOP leaders developed a strategy to take over North Carolina's state government for the first time since 1870: Aggressively pursue the seats of vulnerable Democratic lawmakers and win House and Senate majorities by 2010; use those majorities to redistrict the state in Republicans' favor; and push a business-friendly, socially conservative agenda in a Southern state where progressive policies once held sway.

headline.main: EU Finance Ministers to Consider Focusing on Spending Cap to Cut Morass of Budget Rules
headline.print_headline: EU Finance Ministers to Consider Focusing on Spending Cap to Cut Morass of Budget Rules

docs.snippet: European Union finance ministers agreed on Saturday to discuss whether they can regain some control over a morass of EU budget rules by focusing mainly on an annual spending cap as the best measure of compliance....
docs.lead_paragraph: European Union finance ministers agreed on Saturday to discuss whether they can regain some control over a morass of EU budget rules by focusing mainly on an annual spending cap as the best measure of compliance.

headline.main: Upside Limited for 2016 Even as Earnings Bottom
headline.print_headline: Upside Limited for 2016 Even as Earnings Bottom

docs.snippet: Even with a spate of high-profile earnings disappointments in recent days from the likes of Caterpillar, Microsoft and Google's parent company, the profit recession that has dogged U.S. stocks since last fall is still expected to come to an end in...
docs.lead_paragraph: Even with a spate of high-profile earnings disappointments in recent days from the likes of Caterpillar, Microsoft and Google's parent company, the profit recession that has dogged U.S. stocks since last fall is still expected to come to an end in the second half of this year.

headline.main: In an Age of Privilege, Not Everyone Is in the Same Boat
headline.print_headline: In New Age of Privilege, Not All Are in Same Boat

docs.snippet: Companies are becoming adept at identifying wealthy customers and marketing to them, creating a money-based caste system....
docs.abstract: Companies are increasingly marketing exclusive products and experiences to wealthy few able to afford them, creating closed realm off limits to most; economic inequality that has been hot button issue in election season represents opportunity rather than injustice to savvy marketers.
docs.lead_paragraph: Companies are becoming adept at identifying wealthy customers and marketing to them, creating a money-based caste system.
